entry.title: desw0lf/filen-public-express: A lightweight, unofficial file retrieval server powered by the Filen.io SDK. Designed for public, read-only access to files such as images, PDFs, and videos.

entry.title: abhayymishraa/openweathermap-mcp-server: A lightweight MCP server using Bun to fetch current and 5-day weather data from OpenWeatherMap APIs. Built with @modelcontextprotocol/sdk, Zod for validation, and Axios for API calls. Provides tools to get weather info by latitude and longitude over stdio transport.
entry.content: A lightweight MCP server using Bun to fetch current and 5-day weather data from OpenWeatherMap APIs. Built with @modelcontextprotocol/sdk, Zod for validation, and Axios for API calls. Provides tools to get weather info by latitude and longitude over stdio transport.

entry.title: Johan4954/SubProbe: ⚡ JavaScript-aware crawler for security researchers and bug bounty hunters. Extract hidden endpoints and internal subdomains through static and semantic analysis of JS files. Lightweight. Fast. Sneaky.

entry.title: oorrwullie/homebridge-linky: Linky — A lightweight, fast API server for controlling HomeKit devices remotely through Homebridge. Full REST API with secure authentication, dynamic key rotation, health metrics, and future WebSocket support.

entry.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
entry.content: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
